name: Background Color
desc: Changes background color on hover

name: Scale
desc: Element scales up on hover

name: Shadow
desc: Applies shadow to element or text on hover

name: Opacity
desc: Adjusts transparency of the element on hover

name: Rotate
desc: Element rotates on hover

name: Gradient
desc: Applies gradient background on hover

name: Blur
desc: Applies blur effect to the element on hover

name: Border
desc: Adds a border to the element on hover

name: Outline
desc: Adds an outline around the element on hover

name: Slide Right
desc: Element slides to the right on hover

name: Text Shadow
desc: Applies shadow to text on hover

name: Slide Up
desc: Element slides upward on hover

name: Skew
desc: Skews the element along X and Y axes on hover

name: Border Radius
desc: Rounds the corners of the element on hover

name: Hologram
desc: Applies multicolor holographic style on hover

name: Flip (Vertical)
desc: Flips the card vertically on hover

name: Brightness
desc: Increases brightness of element on hover

name: Glow
desc: Applies glowing effect using shadows on hover

name: Invert
desc: Inverts the color scheme of the element on hover

name: Flip (Horizontal)
desc: Flips the card horizontally on hover

name: Tilt
desc: Tilts the card based on cursor position on hover

name: Ripple
desc: Creates a ripple animation on hover

name: Heartbeat
desc: Card pulses like a heartbeat on hover

name: Slide-Up Reveal
desc: Reveals hidden slide content on hover
